author: daryl_alvarado
post: Hey Barrie, I heard you speaking as a guest on “Coast to Coast” last night (12/17/09). Great work once again Barrie! As I listened to the interview I pulled out my autographed picture of the shcroud that you once gave me, and, as I marveled upon it, I was thankfull to have known you. The schroud is as real and authentic as Jesus himself was real and authentic..
title: Barrie Schwartz on the Shroud of Turin
